mapper.insert: insert into JAI_T_JAILTIME ( TEL_JAI_NAME, TEL_SENDREC_DATABASE_TIME, TEL_SENDREC_REC_LASTTIME, TEL_SENDREC_SEND_LASTTIME, TEL_ANAL_DATABASE_TIME, TEL_ANAL_LASTTIME, TEL_ANAL_GETSEND_LASTTIME, TEL_BEFDEAL_DATABASE_TIME, TEL_BEFDEAL_SEND_LASTTIME, TEL_BEFDEAL_REC_LASTTIME, TEL_BEFDEAL_GETTOAUO_LASTTIME, TEL_BEFDEAL_GETRATEL_LASTTIME, USERID, LAST_TIME ) values ( '监控', sysdate, sysdate, sysdate, sysdate, sysdate, sysdate, sysdate, sysdate, sysdate, sysdate, sysdate, 'SYSTEM_TEL', sysdate )
mapper.update:
UPDATE JAI_T_JAILTIME SET LAST_TIME = sysdate,
${colum} = sysdate WHERE TEL_JAI_NAME = '监控'
